attributes.description: At East Rand Toyota, we learn from the past, build on the present and anticipate the future. East Rand Toyota always pursues perfection so that every customer can live fully by making the most of every moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect commuter on our Automark Pre owned floor. At East Rand Toyota we promise; nationwide delivery, Trade Ins welcomed and please have peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a Check List. Speak to our Finance department for tailored financial packages to suit your needs.

attributes.description: Subject to price increase and stock availabilIty now at Haval Bruma, The P- Series is available in 2.0 Turbo Diesel, the powerplant delivers 120kW and 400 Nm of torque, Auto ZF 8 Speed Transmission and 6 speed manual transmission. The P Series is described in South Africa by one simple word of more. More space, more design appeal, more intelligent technologies, more luxury, comfort and convenience, more quality, more durability, more reliability and more safety. The entire range of P series bakkies have high safety levels, Airbags feature on all models and vary from 2 airbags on base models up to 7 airbags in the top specification. Vehicle stability and traction control is standard across the range as well as hill hold assist. Park distance control is standard on all models and as you go up in the range you go from reverse camera to a full 360 view in the higher spec.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description: At Mahindra East Rand Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. All Pre-Owned vehicles are 125 point checked, Serviced and Road Ready. We will design a package around your financial needs. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license & registration fees. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks, subject to Bank Approval. Warranty and Service plans available and all vehicles have Tracker Pre-Fitment. Trade-in’s welcome. T’s & C’s Apply.

attributes.description:
Be a big deal in a small car
Introducing the all-new Toyota Agya. This compact urban runabout has a 1.0-litre engine that’s economical, ready to go, and available in both an automatic and manual transmission. With the Agya’s brave new approach to design and its wide range of features, you can enjoy a big lifestyle without compromise.
